A Relation is a template for a link, that defines the behaviour for the saved link, such as the number of metadata items that can be included in the link and the roles these metadata items have for the link.

To learn more about a Relation, click the blue icon () in the drop down to view the relation definition in a new window.

To get help on relations, click here.

Links can be only created with relations that have at least one role.
